\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{modules:Game_Logic.update_statistics}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{Game\_Logic.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{update\_statistics}}}{\sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{name}\DUrole{p}{:}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{n}{str}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{hits}\DUrole{p}{:}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{n}{int}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{o}{=}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{default_value}{0}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{misses}\DUrole{p}{:}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{n}{int}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{o}{=}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{default_value}{0}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{wins}\DUrole{p}{:}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{n}{int}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{o}{=}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{default_value}{0}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{losses}\DUrole{p}{:}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{n}{int}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{o}{=}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{default_value}{0}}}{}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Updates the player statistics in the database.
\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Args:}
\sphinxAtStartPar
name (str): Player name.
hits (int): Number of hits to add. Defaults to 0.
misses (int): Number of misses to add. Defaults to 0.
wins (int): Number of wins to add. Defaults to 0.
losses (int): Number of losses to add. Defaults to 0.

\end{description}

\end{fulllineitems}

\sphinxAtStartPar

\end{description}

\chapter{GUI Module}
\label{\detokenize{modules:module-GUI}}\label{\detokenize{modules:gui-module}}\index{module@\spxentry{module}!GUI@\spxentry{GUI}}\index{GUI@\spxentry{GUI}!module@\spxentry{module}}\index{HangmanGUI (class in GUI)@\spxentry{HangmanGUI}\spxextra{class in GUI}}

\begin{fulllineitems}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{modules:Database_Logic.decrypt}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{Database\_Logic.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{decrypt}}}{\sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{text}\DUrole{p}{:}\DUrole{w}{ }\DUrole{n}{str}}}{{ $\rightarrow$ str}}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Decrypts a string that was encrypted with the \sphinxtitleref{encrypt} function,
shifting letters and digits backward by 1.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Parameters}
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{text}} \textendash{} The encrypted string to decrypt.

\sphinxlineitem{Returns}
\sphinxAtStartPar
The original decrypted string.

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar

Wraps around alphabetically and numerically.

\sphinxAtStartPar

\sphinxAtStartPar

\end{description}\end{quote}
